posts.post_content:
Blue skies, nothing but blue skies, do I see?

Both the card and the weather are fair.

Ungraded, Cubs shirt

Back features a dandy crop mark pairing, both horizontal and vertical.

$95 shipped today.  Yeah, net to me.  Actual shipping less $1 to Canada.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-raw/10790/evers-batting-cubs-shirt[/IMG]

You are not buying the reflections or the holder.

your card has a beauty of a "crop" mark in the upper right hand corner on the back.....that should be a premium on this!;)

maybe a $100.00 just for the full crop mark:eek:

No responses to initial pricing.

The current price of $149 will not be raised.

If the card does not sell, it may be lowered.

Don't wait for the price to hit single digits.

I only know what I paid and have no idea about its freakin' value with the crop marks.

Daily price reductions will continue for now, but if you want to shoot me an offer, go for it.

You never know.

The card belongs in a Net54 home. :eek:
Every collection needs more crops, which can be hard to find.

Hard to keep track of all the offers rolling in.:eek:

I may just have to accept the next one.;)

Oh, what the hell, if you want the reflections and the holder, they are included.

Let's go boys.
